Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Kevin Eastman (based on characters created by), Peter Laird (based on characters created by), Stuart Gillard
Actors: Elias Koteas, Paige Turco, Stuart Wilson, Sab Shimono
Plot: When their closest friend April O'Neil discovers an ancient scepter with magical powers, the turtles must cow-a-bunga their way back to 17th century Japan to rescue her from the evil clutches of Lord Norinaga.
